alert.note: Alert for Bradley; Calhoun; Drew (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 24 at 6:39PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Bradley and southeastern Calhoun Counties through 715 PM CDT... At 639 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles northeast of Smackover to near Moro Bay State Park to 8 miles northeast of Cooley. Movement was east at 65 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Warren... Hermitage... Calion... Ingalls... Hilo... Moro Bay State Park... Lanark... Moro Bay... Artesian... Carmel... Farmville... Johnsonville... Blanchton... Vick... Gravelridge... Mt Olive in Bradley County... Marsden... Jersey... Sumpter... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CDT for southwestern Arkansas. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until midnight CDT for southeastern and southwestern Arkansas.
